title: NO BROKER FEE. Penthouse in a luxury building. Financial District
posting_body: ['Andrea Cortese', 'Phone: 914-349-1626', 'Mobile: 914-349-1626', 'Fax: 212-227-1120', 'Email: <URL>', 'NO FEE.This large two bedroom penthouse features a corner living room with double exposure, added privacy of split bedrooms and a large en-suite primary bath with a double vanity, windowed gourmet kitchen with stone countertops, stainless steel appliances and eating bar, large walk-in closet, in-unit washer/dryer and wood floors throughout.', 'Residents have the option to explore 22,000sq/ft of amenities.', 'Fitness center which features daily classes, a Pilates and yoga studios, a turf track, a bowling alley, virtual golf, a resident lounge with billiards and ping pong, and screening room in historic bank vault.', 'Listing ID #: 138635', 'Price: $14,545', 'Property Type: Apartment', 'Bedrooms: 2.0', 'Bathrooms: 2.0', 'Approx.', 'Size: 1,589 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Building Amenities', 'Doorman', 'Elevator', 'Health Club', 'Subway', 'Laundry', 'Bicycle Room', 'Nursery', 'Lounge', 'Valet', 'Wheelchair Access', 'WiFi', 'Receiving Room', 'Business Center', 'Apartment Amenities', 'Walls OK', 'Balcony', 'Terrace', 'Dishwasher', 'Washer', 'Hardwood', 'Renovated', 'Light', 'NO FEE', 'Walk In Closet', 'Laundry In Unit', 'Stainless Steel Appliances', 'Andrea Cortese', 'Phone: 914-349-1626', 'Mobile: 914-349-1626', 'Fax: 212-227-1120', 'Email: <URL>', 'To view, call or text Andrea Cortese at 914-349-1626 or email <URL>']
